generic_imitate.title: Identify your remote�
generic_imitate.body: Click a button on your remote to pair it.�

generic_test_remote.title: Test your wall switch�
generic_test_remote.body: Press a random button on your wall switch or click the buttons in the image above to test the signal. Press next to continue.�

generic_imitate.body: Trigger your sensor manually or toggle the learn switch to DEL and then back to SET.

generic_test_remote.body: Trigger your sensor manually or use the LEARN switch on your sensor to test the signal. Press next to continue.

generic_choice.title: Copy signal from remote or pair device with Homey�
generic_choice.body: Choose if you want to copy an existing signal from a paired remote or if you want to generate a new signal to pair this device.�

generic_imitate.title: Copy your remote signal�
generic_imitate.body: Press the button that is paired to your socket.�

generic_test_switch.title: Test your socket�
generic_test_switch.body: Use the switch above to test your socket. Press next to continue.�

generic_test_switch_2.body: Use your remote or the switch above to test your socket. Press next to continue.�

generic_program.title: Put the socket in pairing mode�

generic_program.body: Press and hold the program button on your socket for a few seconds, the light on your socket should start blinking when you release the button. When it is in pairing mode click next.
Press the program button on your receiver. Then press next.

generic_imitate.body: Press the up/down button that is paired to your blinds.

generic_test_switch.title: Test your blinds
generic_test_switch.body: Use the buttons above to test your blinds. Press next to continue.

generic_test_switch_2.body: Use your remote or the buttons above to test your blinds. Press next to continue.

generic_choice.body: Choose if you want to copy the signal from your doorbell or if you want to generate a new signal to pair your doorbell with.

generic_test_button.title: Test your doorbell
generic_test_button.body: Use the button above to test your doorbell. Press next to continue.

generic_test_button_2.body: Use your doorbell or the button above to test your doorbell. Press next to continue.

generic_program.body: Unplug the socket for a couple of seconds and plug it back in, the light should now be blinking. When it is in pairing mode click next.

generic_test_remote.title: Test your remote�
generic_test_remote.body: Press a random button on your remote or click the button in the image above to test the signal. Press next to continue.�

generic_imitate.body: Press the button that is paired to your fitting.

generic_program.body: Press and hold the program button on your fitting for a few seconds, the light on your fitting should start blinking when you release the button. When it is in pairing mode click next.

generic_test_switch.title: Test your fitting
generic_test_switch.body: Use the switch above to test your fitting. Press next to continue.

generic_test_switch_2.body: Use your remote or the switch above to test your fitting. Press next to continue.

generic_imitate.title: Pair your constact sensor
generic_imitate.body: Connect and then disconnect the two parts of your sensor.

generic_test_remote.title: Test your contact sensor
generic_test_remote.body: Use your contact sensor to test the signal. Press next to continue.

error.device_exists: This device is already paired with Homey.�
error.no_device: No device set to pair. Please close the pairing wizard and try again.�
error.no_settings: No settings object. Please try again.�
